Stereotype.name: Image
Stereotype.notes: Label is used for displaying text. No user interaction functionality is provided.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: doColumnName
Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if is data bind, the source link of the image will be dynamically extracted from the current row of the data object.

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: link
Tag.description: The link to be open on mouse click of the image.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: src
Tag.description: The source link of the image, if it's a static location.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: PopupMenu
Stereotype.notes: Quarix.Widgets.PopupMenu provides a container similar to Quarix.Widgets.MenuBar but for context menus. It can contain a series of Quarix.Widgets.Menu's and Quarix.Widgets.MenuItems.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the menu will be hidden at initialization.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: hoverMode
Tag.description: If set to true, the user doesn't have to click to open the menu system, so it works similar to common web menus

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: displayAsList
Tag.description: Setting this property on TRUE, allows the menu bar to flow vertically instead of a normal horizontal flow. This feature is useful for creating vertical navigational menuâ€™s in a page by using menu bars together with an Accordion or another type of container.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: altDO
Tag.description: Alternative data object. Especially useful for lookup fields that must work both in view and add/update mode. Because during an add/update operation the master data object is locked yet still the values have to change as a result of user modifying the data. Durring navigation data values comes as dataAvailable event, data that is processed and displayed. However during user modification values have to come as Action.valueChanged events and in that case an alternate data object is looked up and used for value lookups.

Tag.name: altDOColumns
Tag.description: In case and altDO is given and an Action.valueChanged event is received the line mask values of the lookup field will be filled with their equivalent altDO column values as specified by the altDOColumns (comma separated).

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: lineMask
Tag.description: Contains the mask for each line of the lookup field. The mask of a line contains the static and dynamic data that creates a display line, dynamic data (the one being replaced with live data) being marked in {}

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onObjectValueEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onObjectValueExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onObjectValuePublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: rows
Tag.description: The number of rows this lookup field contains. Used together with lineMask determines the representation of the displayed data

Tag.name: size
Tag.description: In case the width of the component needs to be fixed it can be specified trough this property. The size is interpreted in "em" at the default or "base" size for a rendered font glyph as contained within an HTML element where the default display is assigned by the user agent and not pixels.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: url
Tag.description: URL for lookup resolution, to avoid the overhead of linking to a data object.

Tag.name: urlNameColumn
Tag.description: The name of the column from which the description will be taken in case URL lookup resolution is used.

Tag.name: urlValueColumn
Tag.description: The name of the column on which the value entered by user will be check in case URL lookup resolution is used.

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: Label
Stereotype.notes: Label is used for displaying text. No user interaction functionality is provided.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: doColumnName
Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if is data bind, the content of the this widget will be dynamically extracted from the current row of the data object.

Tag.name: fieldId
Tag.description: In case the label is related to a Field, then the id of the field can be used to functionally link the two components

Tag.name: required
Tag.description: Visually mark the label so that it evidentiates that the related field is required

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width

Stereotype.name: InputField
Stereotype.notes: Input fields are used for entering and displaying data in form and data views. The data can be of various types, such as : char, logical, integer, decimal or text. Input fields can have different behaviors such as read-only, or required and representations, as: such as Passwordfield, Textfield, Radiofield, Toglebox, Textarea, Combofield, Hiddenfield.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: dateFormat
Tag.description: In case the field has another format indicator like the dateFormat this can be passed in through this property. Usually it is used at field masks for date fields especially where format can be '99-99-9999' and dateFormat 'dmy' or 'mdy'

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: doColumnName
Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if the field is data bind.

Tag.name: fkDOColumnName
Tag.description: In case there is an fk window associated with this field and the user inputs the value manually, the field can try to select in the fk window the corespondent row with the associated fkDOColumnName and value

Tag.name: fkToolButtonLabel
Tag.description: In case there is an fk window associated with this field, the tool button that triggers that window can have a custom label set with this property

Tag.name: fkToolButtonTooltip
Tag.description: In case there is an fk window associated with this field, the tool button that triggers that window can have a custom tooltip set with this property

Tag.name: fkWindowName
Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if field is data bind.

Tag.name: fkWindowURL
Tag.description: In case the fk window can not be found in the register and eval URL to be called that should produce a window with the fkWindowName object name

Tag.name: format
Tag.description: The date format of the field. In case the field is a date, integer, decimal field this will be used as the base for the input mask of the field

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: label
Tag.description: Field label

Tag.name: labelAlign
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the label of a field in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: labelLayoutCol
Tag.description: the column in the table layout where the label of a field should be placed

Tag.name: labelLayoutColSpan
Tag.description: the number of columns to span for the label of a field in the containers table layout. The spanned cell's count as 1 cell

Tag.name: labelLayoutRow
Tag.description: the row in the table layout where the label of a field should be placed

Tag.name: labelVAlign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the label of a field in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: onApplyEntryEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on field applyEntry event.

Tag.name: onApplyEntryExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on field applyEntry (focus) event.

Tag.name: onApplyEntryPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on field applyEntry event.

Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onFocusLostEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on field focusLost event.

Tag.name: onFocusLostExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on field focusLost event.

Tag.name: onFocusLostPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on field focusLost event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onObjectValueEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onObjectValueExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onObjectValuePublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on field objectValue event.

Tag.name: onValueChangedEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated on field valueChanged event.

Tag.name: onValueChangedExecute
Tag.description: Java Script code to be executed on field valueChanged event.

Tag.name: onValueChangedPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published on field valueChanged event.

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: required
Tag.description: A special marker for the field that should symbolize to the user that the field is required

Tag.name: size
Tag.description: The size of the field in characters. In case there is a Combofield, the size property will specify the number of rows to be visible.

Tag.name: tabIndex
Tag.description: The position in the tab focus order. The default value, 0 means that the default position will be given considering the field element's position in the DOM Node

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: value
Tag.description: The initial value of this field

Tag.name: viewAs
Tag.description: The visual/internal reprezentation of this field. Possible values are: 'Textfield', 'Passwordfield', 'Radiofield', 'Combofield', 'Textarea', 'Togglebox'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: link
Tag.description: The HTTP address this link will point to.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: The maximum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: The minimum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the component (pixels)

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: target
Tag.description: An optional target of the link.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: value
Tag.description: The text to be displayed in the link.

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: HtmlBlock
Stereotype.notes: Simple component able to display any HTML content inside any container.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: content
Tag.description: The HTML content to be displayed inside the component. For large content create an attribute with the same name as the tag value was a limited size.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: doColumnName
Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if any. If there is a link of type Data between an HTMLBlock and a IDataObject then the content of the HTML block will be dynamically extracted from the current row of the data object.

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the component (pixels)

Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.description: The maximum height of the component (pixels)

Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute

Tag.description: Evaluate (load and interpret) the resources available at given URL when the button is clicked

Tag.description: Publish an event / Link event when the button is pushed

Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: caseSensitive
Tag.description: Only valid if client side filtering is used, or if this is enabled also on the back-end which provides the data for value options.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: doColumnName
Tag.description: Column name to send when requesting data from URL. if null, the object name is sent

Tag.name: forceMatch
Tag.description: Force the user to choose only a valid option from the value list, if set to false the user can enter any value even if not in the list.

Tag.description: Minimum number of characters required for the AutoComplete to activate. If 0, activates when linked field is focused

Tag.name: size
Tag.description: The maximum number of items to display; any more and a scrollbar is used

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: url
Tag.description: The address from where to fetch the list of values

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: valueOptions
Tag.description: Alternative list of key/name pairs for Combofield view (comma separated)

Tag.name: valuesDO
Tag.description: Name of the DataObject from which to retrieve the values for the AutoComplete

Tag.name: valuesDONameColumn
Tag.description: Name of the column from where to get the name to associate to each value

Tag.name: valuesDOValueColumn
Tag.description: Name of the column of the DO from where to get the values

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)
